title: Philadelphia Double-Chocolate Cheesecake
ingredients: ¼ cup butter or margarine, melted
4 (8 ounce) packages Philadelphia Cream Cheese, softened
1 (8 ounce) package Baker's Semi-Sweet Chocolate, melted
instructions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F. Mix crumbs and butter; press onto bottom of 13x9-pan lined with foil. Bake 10 min. Beat cream cheese, sugar, flour and vanilla with mixer until blended. Add chocolate; mix well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low after each just until blended. Pour over crust. Bake 45 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool. Refrigerate 4 hours. Use foil to lift cheesecake from pan. Top with berries.
